name: Just a Platformer (test demo 1)
description:
"Just a Platformer" is a sidescrolling 3D platformer made in unity and well that's it... it's just a platformer...

-notice-

The game is still early in development & things are not fully implemented & glitches/bugs may occur.

Enemies, level specific pickups, aren't fully implemented. As well as bonus score tokens. 

More playable levels will be added in future versions.

Note: the game may open in full screen and not be able to be changed, this issue has taken priority for being fixed and will be resolved in a future version!
